comments:
From Sanity for CDT 1.2.0.32.
Found to be a problem on Win JDK 1.3.1_03.
Also reproduced using Solaris JDK 1.3.1_09.
Did not reproduce using Win JRE 1.4.1_01.


1. Create and build a simple HelloWorld executable.
2. Create a Debug configuration (using Cygwin Debugger).
3. Launch the debug configuration.


On Win32, dialog appears: "Exception occurred while launching"
On Solaris, dialog says "Error within Debug UI:" and an OK button.

On Win32, the .metadata/.log file contains:
(Solaris log file contains something similar.)

!ENTRY org.eclipse.debug.ui 4 120 Sep 02, 2003 11:43:27.843
!MESSAGE Error logged from Debug UI: 
!STACK 0
java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException: java.lang.NoSuchMethodError
	at org.eclipse.cdt.debug.mi.core.command.MICommand.parametersToString
(MICommand.java:120)
	at org.eclipse.cdt.debug.mi.core.command.MICommand.toString
(MICommand.java:132)
	at org.eclipse.cdt.debug.mi.core.MISession.postCommand
(MISession.java:297)
	at org.eclipse.cdt.debug.mi.core.MISession.postCommand
(MISession.java:270)
	at org.eclipse.cdt.debug.mi.core.MISession.<init>(MISession.java:145)
	at org.eclipse.cdt.debug.mi.core.MIPlugin.createMISession
(MIPlugin.java:71)
	at org.eclipse.cdt.debug.mi.core.MIPlugin.createMISession
(MIPlugin.java:86)
	at org.eclipse.cdt.debug.mi.core.MIPlugin.createCSession
(MIPlugin.java:135)
	at org.eclipse.cdt.debug.mi.core.MIPlugin.createCSession
(MIPlugin.java:101)
	at org.eclipse.cdt.debug.mi.core.GDBDebugger.createLaunchSession
(GDBDebugger.java:52)
	at org.eclipse.cdt.debug.mi.core.CygwinGDBDebugger.createLaunchSession
(CygwinGDBDebugger.java:36)
	at 
org.eclipse.cdt.launch.internal.LocalCLaunchConfigurationDelegate.launch
(LocalCLaunchConfigurationDelegate.java:83)
	at org.eclipse.debug.internal.core.LaunchConfiguration.launch
(LaunchConfiguration.java:156)
	at org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.DebugUIPlugin.buildAndLaunch
(DebugUIPlugin.java:676)
	at org.eclipse.debug.ui.DebugUITools.buildAndLaunch
(DebugUITools.java:538)
	at org.eclipse.debug.ui.DebugUITools$2.run(DebugUITools.java:487)
	at org.eclipse.jface.operation.ModalContext$ModalContextThread.run
(ModalContext.java:101)
Resolved in build 1.2.0.34.
Builds were being compiled with JDK 1.4.1.
Verified on Windows (1.2.0.34 Sanity) and Solaris (1.2.0.35)
using JDK 1.3.1.
